pastry.name: Cherry Blossom Bun
pastry.description: "Soft and fluffy bun with a sweet cherry filling, decorated with pink cherry blossom motif."

pastry.name: Mini Floss Pillows
pastry.description: "Savory bite-sized pastries filled with pork floss, encased in a light, flaky pastry shell."

pastry.name: Mini Cheese Pillows
pastry.description: "Delectable mini pastries with a rich, creamy cheese filling in a buttery, flaky crust."

pastry.name: Assorted Brookie
pastry.description: "A delicious hybrid of brownies and cookies in assorted flavors, offering the perfect balance of chewy and crunchy textures."

pastry.name: Ube Coco Brookie Pizza
pastry.description: "A unique dessert pizza combining the flavors of purple yam and coconut in a brownie-cookie base, perfect for sharing."

pastry.name: Choco Chip Brookie Pizza
pastry.description: "Indulgent chocolate chip cookie-brownie fusion in pizza form, loaded with chocolate chips throughout."

pastry.name: Three Cheese Brookie Pizza
pastry.description: "Decadent brookie pizza featuring three premium cheeses blended into a sweet-savory dessert experience."

pastry.name: Carrot Cheesecake (5 inches)
pastry.description: "Carrot cheesecake filling enclosed in a moist carrot cake base, topped with cream frosting, roasted walnuts and toasted pumpkin seeds."

pastry.name: Coffee Caramel Chiffon (6 inches)
pastry.description: "A 5 layer cake made with coffee flavored chiffon and dulce de leche custard, frosted with vanilla and caramel buttercream, sprinkles with toasted crumbles."

pastry.name: Choco Messy Bun
pastry.description: "A rich chocolate bun filled with creamy chocolate custard filling, topped with melted dark chocolate and cocoa powder."

pastry.name: Pumpkin Bun (Pack of 7)
pastry.description: "Made with fresh roasted pumpkin infused dough."

pastry.name: Red Velvet Messy Bun
pastry.description: "A red velvet bun filled with cream cheese filling, dusted with powdered sugar."

pastry.name: Cinnamon Loaf
pastry.description: "A red velvet bun filled with cream cheese filling, dusted with powdered sugar."

pastry.name: Japanese Chocolate Roll
pastry.description: "Soft dough filled with choco sticks and drizzled with dark chocolate and powdered sugar."

pastry.name: Premium Cheese Loaf
pastry.description: "Classic soft and fluffy Japanese milk bread, infused with cheese bits."

pastry.name: Cranberry Cheese Roll (3pcs)
pastry.description: "Soft rolls with sweet cranberries and premium cheese."

pastry.name: Whole Wheat Loaf
pastry.description: "A soft whole wheat loaf topped with oats."
